name: peppymeterbasic
description: Basic PeppyMeter for Volumio (Bookworm) with optional Camilla FIFO / Monitor backend
author: Balbuze, community contributors

volumio_info.changelog: Bookworm-safe installer (PEP 668), anonymous shallow clone, arm64/amd64/armhf support, UIConfig: Camilla FIFO/Monitor options.
volumio_info.details: VU meter plugin with Loopback or Camilla FIFO backend. Default remains Loopback for compatibility.
